data.persona: I am a place where goods are sold. I am always filled with a lot of merchants. I am also filled with fragrant aromas and nice products.
data.description:
You are in the Central Bazaar.
Shops as far as the eye can see, merchandise from around the region can be seen. Various goods ranging from dinner sets with colorful patterns to delicious smelling spices can be found here.
There's a merchandise here.
The soldier named zinney is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I want Zinney to buy my goods because I think he has plenty of gold.
data.long_motivation: I want to allow the merchants in me, the local bazaar, to make lots of profit while they are selling products here.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give fragrant spices and fascinating wares to soldier named Zinney

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get gold pieces from soldier named Zinney
